title: B-Legend! Battle B-Daman (Battle B-Daman)
synopsis: Upon the creation of marble launching machines known as B-Daman, people started to participate in the competitive sport B-DaBattles. However, B-Daman contain hidden powers which enhance marble shooting that can be misused for combative purposes.
related_anime: ['B-Densetsu! Battle B-Daman', 'B-Legend! Battle B-Daman Fire Spirits!']
